title: Thunderbird lost Password (desperate for help)
content:
I have lost my password and even the primary password. Is there any way to recover from this dilemma? When I click on the Thunderbird icon, the first thing I see is Enter your Primary Password. I enter my last PW. No success. So I click on Cancel. Up comes a partial TB screen and another request for the Primary PW. Click cancel again and there is TB with all my old emails. It is trying to connect to the host server by sending login information repeatedly. It eventually times out and asks for the Primary PW again. I can get my email by connecting to the ISP (Frontier.com), but I really miss my TB. It has now been many months and I have all the emails since TB stopped working. I know I can change my email address and start over but what I would really like to do is pickup from where I left off. I can't believe I am the only person to have this happen. I have tried using the Forgot Password option but to use that you need the Primary PW and I have neither of them. I am open to trying anything.

Larry Kamberg ldkamb@frontier.com
creator: ldkamb

title: Thunderbird not responding, MacOS
content:
I've been using Thunderbird for years. I shutdown my computer (MacOS Sequoia) and went away for a few days, and now Thunderbird hangs when I try to use it. I have one main email account which I access with POP, and a couple of other accounts which I access with IMAP. I can access the downloaded messages in the Inbox of the POP account that I downloaded before going away, but I can't read any other folders (I have many folders since I've used Thunderbird for so long), or access the IMAP accounts. Thunderbird shows that I have new mail waiting on the POP server, but it hangs when I try to download them. It does not show mail waiting on the IMAP accounts, although I know new mail is there.

I have tried re-installing Thunderbird, and rebooted the computer, with no change. When Thunderbird hangs, it eats memory until the system runs out, and I have to use Force Quit to terminate it.

It's the first time I've had a problem with it!
creator: caroline144

title: SMTP and Microsoft365 Outgoing server problem
content:
Recently, thunderbird has stopped sending email from my hotmail configured account a month ago. The problem is that I tried everything, went to all blogs but nothing is working for me. In the end, I did the following:

1. Deleted the hotmail account and added account again. 2. Deleting the old passwords for microsoft365 and inserting new in Thunderbird.

With the following settings as attached.

The incoming settings are good with IMAP the only issue is with the out going SMTP server and password settings.

I suspect the problem is that I am using other microsoft365 accounts open on my PC in other tabs, thats why its not working. This means, Thunderbird is not intelligent enough to see whether the outgoing request is for the configured account. It takes the system managed or 365 managed outgoing server settings and tries to put the password (which is a wrong password for this account), and everything messes up.

Any suggestions? Thanks.
creator: gtauseef

title: Thunderbird
content: I have an account e with gmx and Thunderbird is not able to connect. Could you please look into this and find what settings are needed? Thankfully, Digi
creator: fire.opaldrac

title: Thunderbird Authentication Page Blank/Empty
content:
Thunderbird worked fine until a few hours ago when, all of sudden, my outlook accounts popped up for re-authentication. The problem is the authentication page is now empty/blank. I checked the forums and ensured all the settings were okay (it was working anyway). This is for my personal email accounts, not company's.

Any help is appreciated.
creator: sean5688

title: GMX - Kein Email Versand
content:
Hallo,

ich bekomme diese Fehlermeldung, wenn ich eine Email mit meinem GMX Account versenden möchte. Wie kann ich das Problem lösen? Das Konto habe ich bereits einmal vollständig entfernt und wiede hinzugefügt. Hat leider nicht geholfen. Andere Konto wie WEB.DE oder GMAIL sind ebenfalls eingerichtet und funktionieren einwandfrei.

Vielen Dank!

Fehlermeldung: "Die Nachricht wurde gesendet, aber es wurde keine Kopie im Gesendet-Ordner (Gesendet) gespeichert, da es zu Problemen bei dem Zugriff auf Netzwerk oder Dateien kam. Sie können es erneut versuchen oder die Nachricht lokal unter Lokale Ordner/Gesendet-sven.thoennes@gmx.de speichern."
creator: sven.thoennes

title: e-mail adress anmolu1@hotmail.de can't be opened
content: please show me a way how to my e-maim about the server for adress: anmolu1@hotmail.de
creator: anmolu

title: Einrichtung von bestehenddem Konto
content: Beim Einrichten meiner bestehenden E-Mail Adresse "dem.ing@web.de" auf diesen Rechner erhalte ich nach dem Ausfüllen immer zuerst die Mitteilung "Einstellungen wurden in der ISP-Datenbank gefunden" Nach dem Anklicken von Fertig erhalte ich nach jedem Versuch den Hinweis "Anmeldung auf dem Server fehlgeschlagen; evtl. Konfiguration, Benutzername ... nicht bkorrekt" obwohl alles stimmt.
creator: heridobler

title: “Reminders” always has the focus
content:
When you have many windows open, it is convenient to use the taskbar icon to return to Thunderbird, but when the "Reminders" window is open, the click always leads to "Reminders" instead of Thunderbird. Is there a way to keep the focus on the main Thunderbird window as a priority? It would be really convenient for my workflow.

Thanks.
creator: jwick.acegc

title: mot de passe oublié
content:
dans la création d'un nouveau compte il est nécessaire de donner un mot de passe.je l'ai oublié que faire faire? 

Réponse sur : balayeuse@sfr.fr                                                                 Jean-pierre

title: Thundirbird troubleshooting

Hello,

Recently, Thunderbird has been crashing regularly on my Dell Alienware computer (freezes). To get out of it, I have to use the task manager... does anyone have an explanation, a solution? Thanks in advance!

Sincerely

title: E-mails that are on my desktop are suddenly not appearing on my laptop. How do I reconnect the two?
content: Emails that are on my desktop suddenly have stopped appearing on my Desktop. (as of Dec. 10 ) They still come into my phone and tablets.
creator: helena22

title: Password
content: cannot send/recieve emails. getting message, enter your password for ( my email address) on imap.tools.sky.com I do not know and cannot find password.
creator: alexmullen56

title: emails being deleted
content: For quite a while now, almost a year, when I delete an email, it deletes more emails than the one I was deleting. Why is this happening? Sometimes I loose an important email without realizing it. This happens on both of my computers, my desktop and my laptop. How do I fix this? Hope you can help and Thank you. Mark D.
creator: markjd1

title: Thunderbird 128.5.2esr (64 bits)
content:
Hello,

I habe been using Thunderbird for many years and I always considered it was a wonderfull software. But it seems that since Thunderbird revisions 128 replaced revisions 115 XXX, this software became less performant and less reliable than before: very (too) often it takes a big time just to open a received e-mail, it is longer and longer to send a new e-mail, even without attached file. Sometimes the software seems locked: nearly all commands are unavailable, in a "grey" state: "the program does not respond ..."

Somtimes, when you run Thunderbitd you see a huge disc activity, as if the software was re-indexing the databases after each launch.

Even if you re-install the software, from scratch, and you re-index all the files the behaviour does not improve.

Theses problems have begun since revision 115 XX was upgraded to 128. We have been told that Thunderbird sofware had been widely "redesigned" but as a result, right now, it is less good than before.

Looking on forums I see that I am not the only one to signal these problems ...

Can you give us some more informations about what is going on with Thunderbird ? It is going to be "stabilized" ? Does this last major evolution of Thunderbird is going to arrive to a more stable state ?

Thank you by advance.

Regards
creator: daniel.pot

title: Kan geen mail verzenden
content: Hallo, ik kan geen mail verzenden. Krijg de melding dat ik eerst moet comprimeren enz. Vandaag heb ik een schone Windows 10 geïnstalleerd en nog steeds hetzelfde probleem. Ingaande en uitgaande instellingen staan goed. Hoe dit op te lossen?
creator: abersonrobin

title: unable to download emails
content: Have been using Thunderbird happily for quite some today, then two days ago got this error message: Unable to write the email to the mailbox. Make sure the file system allows you write privileges, and you have enough disk space to copy the mailboxtext Nothing has changed from my end, would be greatful for any assistance
creator: corsini

title: e-mail account name
content: my inbox has 2 e-mail addresses 1. argusrick@cogeco.ca and 2. argusrick@cogeco.ca_2 How do I get rid of the second address ?
creator: argusrick
